title: LeaverBuster? LOL
body: This is what I think about your LeaverBuster assuming I just up and left the game for no reason. "A punishable offense" - that made me laugh!

replies.body: yeaaahh ive been banned twice over internet issues (this is all in normal btw) and my dad unplugging my computer yeah its a big problem
inb4 people disconnect their internet to purposefully leave games
